pullrequest.title: Refactor Playback into Playback and PlaybackHandle

content.raw:
Done here: 72ff62f

There's a small caveat where we can't guarantee thread safety if the user (or a different library that's running in the same application as our library) makes some configuration changes to sqlite3 during runtime, but I think the danger of that is relatively low. We're expecting all the default recommended settings of sqlite3, so if a user changes those settings, then they're taking their fate into their own hands.

Done here: 72ff62f

There's a small caveat where we can't guarantee thread safety if the user (or a different library that's running in the same application as our library) makes some configuration changes to sqlite3 during runtime, but I think the danger of that is relatively low. We're expecting all the default recommended settings of sqlite3, so if a user changes those settings, then they're taking their fate into their own hands.
